mapper.sql: id, raiser, pet_breed, pet_name, gender, sterilization, weight, address, exemption_num, exemption_time, vaccine_type, pet_regis_num, create_time, create_user_id, modify_time, modify_user_id, sts, msg
mapper.select:
SELECT id, raiser, pet_breed, pet_name, CASE gender WHEN '0' THEN '雌' WHEN '1' THEN '雄' END AS 'gender', CASE sterilization WHEN '0' THEN '未绝育' ELSE '已绝育' end AS 'sterilization', weight, address, exemption_num, exemption_time, vaccine_type, pet_regis_num, create_time, create_user_id, modify_time, modify_user_id, CASE sts WHEN '0' THEN '待审核' WHEN '1' THEN '已登记' WHEN '2' THEN '拒绝登记' WHEN '3' THEN '申请删除登记' ELSE '退出登记' END AS 'sts', msg, exemption_img, pet_regIs_img, pet_img FROM st_applet_pet where 1=1 and village_code = #{villageCode}
and sts = #{sts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t.id AS id, t.pet_breed AS petBreed, t.pet_name AS petName, CASE t.gender WHEN '1' THEN '雄' ELSE '雌' END AS gender, t.exemption_num AS exemptionNum, CASE t.sts WHEN '0' THEN '待审核' WHEN '1' THEN '已登记' WHEN '2' THEN '登记失败' WHEN '3' THEN '申请退出登记' WHEN '4' THEN '退出登记' END AS sts from st_applet_pet as t where create_user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and village_code = #{villageCode}
mapper.insert: insert into st_applet_pet (id, raiser, pet_breed, pet_name, gender, sterilization, weight, address, exemption_num, exemption_time, vaccine_type, pet_regis_num, create_time, create_user_id, modify_time, modify_user_id, sts, msg, exemption_img, pet_regIs_img, pet_img ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{raiser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{petBreed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{petName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sterilization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exemptionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exemptionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{vaccineType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{petRegisNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exemptionImg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{petRegisImg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{petImg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

insert into st_applet_pet
id,
raiser,
pet_breed,
pet_name,
gender,
sterilization,
weight,
address,
exemption_num,

sts,
msg,
exemption_img,
pet_regIs_img,
pet_img,

mapper.update:
update st_applet_pet
raiser = #{raiser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pet_breed = #{petBreed,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pet_name = #{petName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sterilization = #{sterilization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exemption_num = #{exemptionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exemption_time = #{exemptionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
vaccine_type = #{vaccineType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pet_regis_num = #{petRegisNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_user_id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sts = #{sts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
msg = #{msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exemption_img = #{exemptionImg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
pet_regIs_img = #{petRegisImg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
pet_img = #{petImg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update st_applet_pet set raiser = #{raiser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pet_breed = #{petBreed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pet_name = #{petName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sterilization = #{sterilization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exemption_num = #{exemptionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exemption_time = #{exemptionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, vaccine_type = #{vaccineType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pet_regis_num = #{petRegisNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user_id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sts = #{sts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, msg = #{msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exemption_img = #{exemptionImg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, pet_regIs_img = #{petRegisImg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, pet_img = #{petImg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
